code | blank_info = 08-12855 | blank1_name = GNIS feature ID | blank1_info = 0203419 | website = | footnotes = }} Center, officially the Town of Center, is a Statutory Town in Rio Grande and Saguache counties in the U.S. state of Colorado. The town's population was 1,929 at the 2020 United States Census. ==References== Category:Towns in Colorado
